wikipedia_page.main: Allan Robin Winston Hancox (1932 – 1 January 2013) was a Chief Justice of Kenya. He served between 1989 and 1993, and was succeeded by Fred Kwasi Apaloo.

response: **Allan Hancox, 80, judge, Chief Justice of Kenya (1989–1993).
*Allan Hancox, 80, British-born Kenyan justice, Chief Justice (1989–1993).
